page.title: 07"Moby Dick"- The Chippy.
page.content: The name of our house is West House. The property has stood for around 70 years. We don't know too much about the place because we have only lived here a year. We are also new to the area (from Littleport). At the beginning it was a grocery shop. The road outside was a dirt track but it is now a busy A 16 road. Some years later,a lady bought it and turned it into an antique shop. It has been a fish and chip shop for only two and a half years. Mr.Walker had it for eighteen months,then we came along. It is a good business but very hard work-a 24-hour a day job. Still, we enjoy it very much. Trade is very good throughout the year and the fish and chips are as good as any in the neighbourhood. Michael Knight.
